snippet.title: Fault: Elder Orb - Free to Play Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Fault: Elder Orb goes live on the Epic Game store this July 18th 2022!

At the intersection of colliding universes, encounter Heroes fighting for the survival of their worlds and experience a familiar multiplayer arena from a fresh, next-gen viewpoint. 

Feel each tangible high-octane match from an over-the-shoulder perspective while maintaining classic tactical strategies and roles the genre is known for.

Welcome to Fault: Elder Orb! 

Epic Games Store:
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/fault-elder-orb

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1106750/Fault/

Website: https://playfault.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FaultElderOrb
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FaultElderOrb
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/strangematterstudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FaultElderOrb
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PlayFault

Paragon assets and characters in Fault are the property of Epic Games, Inc. and used under a license.
